EPSEVSLDOSMethod

the method to approximate the density of states (DOS) in the EVSL solver

Synopsis

typedef enum { EPS_EVSL_DOS_KPM,
               EPS_EVSL_DOS_LANCZOS } EPSEVSLDOSMethod;

See Also

EPSEVSLSetDOSParameters(), EPSEVSLGetDOSParameters()
